thread.title: ‘Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales’ Super Bowl Trailer Revives Captain Jack
thread.title_full: ‘Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales’ Super Bowl Trailer Revives Captain Jack

author: Collider Staff
title: ‘Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales’ Super Bowl Trailer Revives Captain Jack
text:
SHARE 0 
Disney has unveiled a new trailer for Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales during Super Bowl LI. Directed by Kon-Tiki filmmakers Joachim Rønning and Espen Sandberg , the fifth film in the Pirates franchise boasts a script by Jeff Nathanson ( Catch Me If You Can ) and finds Johnny Depp ’s Captain Jack Sparrow being hunted by the deadly ghost Captain Salazar ( Javier Bardem ), who escapes from the Devil’s Triangle with revenge on his mind. Jack’s only hope is finding the legendary Trident of Poseidon, so he enlists the help of an astronomer ( Kaya Scodelario ) and a young sailor ( Brenton Thwaites ) in his foolhardy quest. 
We’ll have our thoughts on the trailer up shortly, but we wanted to make it available as quickly as possible. 
Watch the new Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales trailer below. The film also stars Kevin R. McNally , Golshifteh Farahani , David Wenham , Stephen Graham , and Geoffrey Rush . The film opens in theaters on May 26th. Related Content
